overview_of_class: A two-quarter sequence for seniors pursuing honors in the English Literature major, consisting of a seminar in the fall quarter and an independent study with the honors advisers in the winter quarter.
name: Senior Sequence
title: WCAS ENGLISH 398-1-20 Senior Sequence

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: A two-quarter sequence for seniors pursuing honors in the English Literature major, consisting of a seminar in the fall quarter and an independent study with the honors advisers in the winter quarter.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: Seniors only. Permission of department required. Attendance at first class mandatory. No P/N registration.

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Department Majors Only
subject: ENGLISH
